name: continuwuity
description: Continuwuity is a self-hosted task tracking and journaling system designed for Software Engineering practices. It supports project organization, time tracking, and streamlines daily work logs.
features: Task Tracking: Monitor project progress and individual tasks efficiently. Stay on top of work.
Work Journaling: Document daily activities and decisions automatically. Build a knowledge base.
Time Tracking: Log hours spent on projects and tasks. Accurate billing and reporting.
Project Organization: Structure work by projects and milestones. Clear visibility into progress.
Engineering Focus: Built specifically for software development workflows. Speaks your language.
Self-Hosted: Keep your work logs and project data private. Your productivity, your server.
